entry.title: Js developer
entry.text:
#вакансия #frontend #react  #senior #мbycr #офис #fulltime #релокация в литву #минск

Позиция – Frontend developer (senior)

Компания – ThiNKT Digital

Локация – Литва

Занятость – полная, офис, гибкое время начала дня

Оплата: от 2 000 до 3400 евро на руки

Релокационный пакет - оплата 1 мес аренды кв и переезд

 The Role • Discuss the client‘s needs to propose the best solution • Develop responsive web applications • Keep up to date with terminology, concepts and best practices for coding web applications • Work closely with colleagues to constantly innovate product functionality and design • Architect customer-centric front-end part of the solution • Collaborate with Venture Managers and engage with development teams 
   We offer • Participation in a dynamic startup solving challenges in the energy sector & beyond • Responsibility over a wide portfolio of products  • Access to large network of startups & corporates through our various partnerships • A great international exposure, and a diverse team with extensive & rich experiences  • Competitive compensation package & flexible work schedule  
 
       Your Background ● Solid foundation in web application front-end development ● You know what are the best UI & UX practices ● Experience with front-end programming languages such as HTML, CSS,  Javascript, ReactJS, etc ● Experience in software process models such as Agile / Scrum / etc ● Well-rounded interpersonal and communication skills to work in flexible teams ● You are Problem solver, and very interested in technology-related entrepreneurial start-up projects. ● Relevant experience with Node or other backend programming languages would be a plus ● Experience with Azure or Amazon Web Service (AWS) would be a huge plus ● Relevant experience 3-5 years ● Required language: English 
 
 



☎️ Контакты для обсуждения вакансии:

telegram @codebor

e-mail ybb@quadcom.ru
